lines.text: So what's the bad news?
You're the bad news.
Don't tell me you memorize tire tread patterns?
What else am I going to do on a Saturday night?
Who are you?
I'm Tyler Pierce... I'm Lisa's father
Lisa! This is about Lisa... I saved Lisa... you can't stop me, I'm on a mission from god.

[Shoots her repeatedly]
Say hello to him for me!
[last lines]
I'll find you, Pierce.
Who are you?
My name is Tyler Pierce... I'm Lisa's father.
[last lines]
Lisa! This is over Lisa... I saved your daughter... she was going to hell without me... you can't kill me I'm on a mission from god.

[Shoots her repeatedly]
Say hello to him for me!
[last lines]
I'll find you Pierce... sooner or later... I'll find you.
[last lines]
Sooner or later you have to make a sacrifice... I never understood that until now.

[Crying over her lost child]
He was begging for me to keep him alive.
